response.overview: Lietli: The Djinn Tribe tells the story of a group of friends who are threatened by a jinn tribe. After his girlfriend Merve's grandmother passed away, Tolga decides to go to the village with her. When Tolga and Merve set out, their close friends Vural and Sibel accompany them. Faced with strange situations from the moment they arrive in the village, the group begins to have strange dreams. Trying to make sense of what happened, Tolga starts researching. Tolga, who gets help from the metaphysics expert Harun, discovers that they are threatened by the Jinn Tribe called the Lietli.
response.title: Lietli: Cin Kabilesi
